description: Final Fantasy Tactics Advance is a game

0.2.0.description:
# Fixes 
- FINALLY fixed generating a patch outside of source builds. Huge thank you to Silvris for giving the fix for this issue. Generation time is also sped up drastically thanks to this. 
- Fixed issue where randomization of units, missions etc. would be the same across multiple FFTA worlds in the same multiworld.
- Fixed missions getting removed from worlds when totema mission unlock is selected across multiple FFTA worlds causing generation failures.

# Additions / features:
- Updated to new options API
- New balanced starter unit randomization option. This option guarantees two physical attackers, two mages and two support as the starting units. Excludes morpher, gadgeteer and beastmaster. 
- Consumables are added as filler items
- Laws and judges are added in as an option. No law randomization currently, option to toggle on and off. Defaults to on.
- Judge units like those in Decision Time aren't randomized anymore. 
- Dispatch missions are added as an option. Adds 188 dispatch missions for a total of 376 new locations. They can be selected from a range of 0 to 6 per gate. 
- Dispatch mission gate option where dispatch missions have their own item locked gate sequence alongside the encounter mission gate.
- New option to set the quick options to on or off by default. Fast text, no attack names, no exp popup etc. Quick options were previously always on. 
- New option to force every mission to give a new recruit.
- New option to set starting gil amount
- New option for branching mission gate paths. Up to three. Should help a bit with the serious bottlenecking of higher gate counts.


# Additional notes:
- The league missions and immunity pass are temporarily removed from the mission pool until their quirks are figured out. 
- Max mission gate count is lowered to 28 temporarily.  
- Job unlock items are temporarily removed due to causing issues. Will be added back in when fixed.

Thank you to all the playtesters!
0.2.0.title: Final Fantasy Tactics Advance APworld 0.2.0

0.2.1.description:
# Fixes
- Fixed missions with higher mission ids not unlocking other missions properly such as Reconciliation, No Literacy etc.
- Added Immunity Pass back into the mission pool since this should now be fixed.

0.2.2.description:
# Fixes
- Prevent received items from being sent again.

0.2.3.description:
# Fixes
- Fixed key error when setting Decision Time as the final mission on a multiple branch setting.

# Notes
- Rolled back client change from previous release due to potentially reintroducing issues when Marche moves while receiving items.
0.2.3.title: Final Fantasy Tactics Advance APworld 0.2.3

0.2.4.description:
# Fixes
- Fixed dispatch mission unlocks having incorrect logic in the patch.  
- Fixed incorrect code for the two path setting - Huge thank you to Rurusachi for these two fixes
- Fixed force recruitment option not working correctly. 
- Small code cleanups 

# Features
- New option to randomize the special units such as Ritz and Cid when forced recruitment is enabled. There is a chance to find them on any mission with this option enabled.
0.2.4.title: Final Fantasy Tactics Advance APworld 0.2.4

0.3.0.description:
This update is all thanks to Rurusachi

# Fixes
- Dispatch mission gates logic fix 
- Various code refactors / cleanups

# Features
- Ability to set the amount of mission reward items as an option, from two to four. Allows the ability to greatly increase the amount of locations.
0.3.0.title: Final Fantasy Tactics Advance APworld 0.3.0

0.3.1.description:
# Fixes
- Prevent items from being received while in the options menu causing glitches to occur
- Hopefully finally fixed the items being resent issue

# Features
- Mission rewards count can now be set up to 6 each. Giving a max total of over 1800 locations for FFTA. Huge thank you to @Rurusachi for adding this feature.
0.3.1.title: Final Fantasy Tactics Advance APworld 0.3.1

0.3.2.description:
# Fixes
- Prevent Marche and Montblanc from rolling a monster job with starting monster option selected due to animation softlocks.
0.3.2.title: Final Fantasy Tactics Advance APworld 0.3.2

0.3.3.description:
# Fixes
- Fix unlocking the incorrect next gate mission with more than one mission path
0.3.3.title: Final Fantasy Tactics Advance APworld 0.3.3

0.4.0.description:
Progressive mission gate items are here!! All thanks to the work of @Rurusachi! You no longer have to receive a progression item and then realize that you can't use it until eight gates later. (unless you want to! the option is still there). Should make a big difference in asyncs especially. 

**This apworld will not work on archipelago 0.4.4 and previous versions due to the use of APPP**

# Fixes
- Code refactor and cleanup - Rurusachi 
- Added league missions back into the mission pool (Yellow Powerz, White Kupos etc.)
- Fixed a few incorrect location names
- Changed final mission unlock option to goal option since I thought it fit better. 
- Fixed some logic with the totema gauntlet goal.
- Remove bandaid patcher version of APPP and now use the core APPP since it is merged (ROM is still required to generate currently due to some base patches not converted to tokens)

# Features
- Progressive mission gate item option added - Rurusachi
- Option to add additional progressive mission gate unlock items into the pool - Rurusachi
- Option to determine what the additional mission gate items end up being (nothing, random equips, or specific item) - Rurusachi
- Randomize law option added. Randomizes laws between law sets
0.4.0.title: Final Fantasy Tactics Advance APworld 0.4.0

0.4.1.description:
Some fixes by @Rurusachi

# Fixes
- Fixed inconsistent behavior with patching on different platforms. 
- Fixed assertion error when generating on source.
0.4.1.title: Final Fantasy Tactics Advance APworld 0.4.1

0.4.2.description:
This update is all thanks to @Rurusachi!

# Fixes
- Finally fixed the receiving items bug. Thanks to Leonarth for giving the unused space in memory.
- League missions disabled again temporarily due to quirks. 
- Exp multiplier now works properly. 
- Some item names fixed to match in-game names. 

# Features
- New exp multiplier option. Can now set exp multiplier to x1 x2 x4 x8 and x16 
- New progressive shop item option. Shop upgrades added as optional item.
- New option to set what items the progressive shops unlock
0.4.2.title: Final Fantasy Tactics Advance APworld 0.4.2

0.4.3.description:
# Fixes
- Fixed dispatch missions and higher index encounter missions having misaligned bitflags
- Fixed progressive items - @Rurusachi
0.4.3.title: Final Fantasy Tactics Advance APworld 0.4.3

0.4.4.description:
# Fixes
- Player assigned to patch to allow patch link for webhost slot
- Optimization of generation speed, especially with enemy rando enabled - @Rurusachi

# Features
- You can now generate games without needing the ROM! Hosts everywhere rejoice - @Rurusachi
0.4.4.title: Final Fantasy Tactics Advance APworld 0.4.4

0.5.0.description:
# Fixes:
- Inventory based abilities like throw and hurl no longer softlock the game

- Quirks with inventory (random items changing or appearing) should no longer occur. 

- Shop upgrade item code has been reworked - @Rurusachi

- All six mission item rewards are now able to be fully displayed in the mission rewards window - @Rurusachi

- Llednar invincibility in Royal Valley should be fixed. Needs more testing to be sure - Thanks to wjg999 for pointing this out and Darthatron and Miona for the fix. 

- Fixed dispatch missions being very incorrect in higher mission gates from off by one error that accumulated. 

- Max gate count lowered to 27 temporarily to prevent generation crashes on max settings with dispatch gates turned on. 

- Fixed example yaml to show progressive shop tier example more clearly. 

- Fixed random equip option not working correctly with vanilla job option. 


# Features:
- Job unlock items V2 is here! All job unlock items now have a different item icon. 
White mage job unlock item will unlock white mage for every supported race etc.  Should hopefully work better than the first iteration.

- Ability randomization is added. All jobs can now be randomized to have different abilities. Currently doesn't apply to monsters
or special units. Option to include abilities from monsters, special units, and even Totema.

- New option to set the amount of AP each ability requires. Set to 0 if you want every job including recruits
and enemies to already know every ability. Helps remove the grind for building up new units.

- New option to toggle shop upgrade behavior to allow the numbers of battles to unlock the first two shop tiers - @Rurusachi

- Starting units and enemies in enemy rando now equip reaction or support abilities if they have learned them. 
Works with ability rando as well. Doesn't include monster units currently.

- Random unit names are now pulled from player names in the multiworld. Supports up to 500 of your closest friends! You might find them
as an ally or have to confront them as an enemy. 

- New option to include monsters in the recruitment pool. 

- Added functionality for starting inventory to work correctly. 

- Added option for job stat growth. Can currently choose vanilla or average (every stat is average growth for every job) with more options planned later

- Added path and gate number to hints under entrance column to better gauge when that item can be received. - Thanks to Facet for the suggestion
0.5.0.title: Final Fantasy Tactics Advance APworld 0.5.0

0.5.1.description:
# Fixes
- Fixed forced recruits not working correctly
- Fixed softlocks that would occur for certain recruits
- Fixed monster recruit option missing from the yaml entirely.
0.5.1.title: Final Fantasy Tactics Advance APworld 0.5.1

0.5.2.description:
# Fixes
- Removed the release ability from the ability pool which corrupted RAM and released items
0.5.2.title: Final Fantasy Tactics Advance APworld 0.5.2

0.6.0.description:
New release courtesy of @Rurusachi 

# Fixes
- Ability random no longer uses option_random which caused an error when generating from source. - Rurusachi
- Removed extra shop upgrade item from the pool - Rurusachi

# Features
- Additional options for progressive shop battle unlock. - Rurusachi
- Gil reward option now added - Rurusachi
- Law cards are now added to the pool! - Rurusachi
- Option for unlocking card shop and cards from the beginning. - Rurusachi
- Option added for faster receive animation when receiving items, enabled by default. - Rurusachi
- Added option to disable naming random units after players in the multiworld, enabled by default. - Spicynun

Notes: Job unlock items temporarily disabled until saving them and White Monk text is fixed. Added warning to ability rando due to potential for softlock under certain combinations currently.
0.6.0.title: Final Fantasy Tactics Advance Apworld 0.6.0

0.6.1.description:
# Fixes
- Refactored and updated the rom patch. - @Rurusachi
- The update takes care of some things that were previously handled in the client. - Rurusachi
- The client no longer needs to handle progressive items differently. - Rurusachi
- The client no longer needs to remove placeholder items from inventory, unless special code needs to be run when doing so (like job unlocks did). - Rurusachi
- Receiving items no longer shows "-" when receiving an odd number of items. (One of the oldest bugs finally defeated) - Rurusachi
- The delay before being able to continue when receiving an item is shorter. - Rurusachi

# Features
- Both A and B buttons can be used to continue, and can be held instead of mashing. - Rurusachi
0.6.1.title: Final Fantasy Tactics Advance Apworld 0.6.1

0.6.2.description:
# Fixes
- Safer code for progressive items to potentially fix the crashing after missions - @Rurusachi
- Removal of import and use of random in a couple spots. Replaced with world.random for true determinism. - Spicynun
- Fixed the issue where all FFTA worlds had random abilities when random within race option was selected - Spicynun
0.6.2.title: Final Fantasy Tactics Advance Apworld 0.6.2

0.6.3.description:
# Fixes
- Fixed the Treasure Hunt bug when receiving an odd number of items which would leave a treasure event on a location and crash the game if on a new game before moving. - @Rurusachi
0.6.3.title: Final Fantasy Tactics Advance Apworld 0.6.3

0.6.4.description:
# Fixes
- Added female exclusive equipment that was accidentally left out of the item pool (Ribbon, Tiara etc.) - Spicynun
- Removed Marche's combo ability that was hardcoded to be equipped at game start - Thanks to Leonarth for this fix! 

# Features
- Universal tracker support for region names to better tell what mission gate each mission is in. Support is in separate apworld to avoid version incompatibility - Rurusachi
0.6.4.title: Final Fantasy Tactics Advance Apworld 0.6.4

0.6.5.description:
# Fixes
- Register patch suffix normally since there is no need to register with Bizhawk UT anymore - @Rurusachi 
- Code optimization through fixing list concatenations. - @Rurusachi
0.6.5.title: Final Fantasy Tactics Advance Apworld 0.6.5
